attributes.action: Give Nursing Mothers The Right To Breast Feed Their Babies In Pubs, Restaurants and Other Public Places
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Failure to do so deprives the baby of its human rights to feed on its mother's milk, recognised as the best diet for it.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
